_description: Defines the ordered pipeline of context processors for compilation

processors.name: Content Selection Processor
processors._description: Filters noisy events and selects relevant context based on agent requirements

processors.name: Compaction Trigger Processor
processors._description: Checks if compaction should be triggered based on thresholds

processors.name: Memory Retrieval Processor
processors._description: Retrieves relevant long-term memories for context enrichment

processors.name: Artifact Resolution Processor
processors._description: Resolves artifact handles to content or maintains lazy references

processors.name: Transformation Processor
processors._description: Transforms structured context into LLM-consumable message format

processors.name: Token Budget Enforcement Processor
processors._description: Enforces token budget limits and truncates context if needed

processors.name: Context Injection Processor
processors._description: Final formatting and injection of context into LLM-ready format
